skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Proficient in creating responsive and dynamic web interfaces using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React.
skills.skills: Tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Node, React, Vue

skills.title: Business Analysis and Presentation
skills.description: Experienced in conducting business analysis, including gap analysis and data validation, and proficient in creating and delivering impactful presentations using Microsoft PowerPoint.

skills.title: Data Analysis
skills.description: Experienced in utilizing data analysis tools to extract, analyze, and visualize data, helping in informed decision-making.

skills.title: Back-End Development
skills.description: Competent in building robust back-end systems with languages such as Python and Java, and experienced in database management and integration using SQL and Hadoop.

portfolio.title: BoilerChat
portfolio.description: This project involved developing a full-stack social media platform focusing on user engagement through real-time interactions and comprehensive user management. The frontend is designed to be intuitive and visually appealing, using Java for the GUI components. The backend, implemented in Java, ensures efficient server-side functionalities supporting real-time user sessions and messaging.

portfolio.title: Data Analysis on Impact of Working Hours on Individual and Societal Perspectives
portfolio.description: This study examines the impact of working hours on both individual well-being and societal metrics, utilizing data from multiple international sources and analyzed using R Studio. The report specifically explores the context of South Korea, comparing it with other countries that have high and low average working hours.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A responsive personal portfolio website employing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to feature a collection of projects with interactive design elements and smooth navigation.
